item.title: Workaround for using the grails-schwartz-plugin in Grails 4
item.author: Author
item.description: Version 1.0.1 of the grails-schwartz-plugin will not work with a grails 4 application as I recently found whilst trying to upgrade an app. You will get the following compilation error: CONFIGURE SUCCESSFUL in 1s Error | Failed to compile create-job.groovy: startup failed: create-job.groovy: 23: unable to resolve class grails.transaction.Transactional @ line 23, column 1. import grails.transaction.Transactional ^ 1 error (Use --stacktrace to see the full trace) Error | Command \[run-app\] error: null (Use --stacktrace to see the full trace) Process finished with exit code 1 The create-job.
